__e: She told me she was hot for you, and I put you two together.
Oh, that was '82, and you may not know this, but your old man was quite the stalker.
I heard your father was fond of it.
About nothing very much, at first, but in time we came to enjoy our chats a great deal.
I know it may be hard for you to believe, but your father loved you very, very much.
Once upon a time... there lived a young girl... who loved her father very much.
He liked the dead more than the living.
He told me he loved me last night.
My wife-- she loved life, but this was not life.
She liked the way they had another life.
They said he Loved him the most.
Because the one thing in the world she loved more is you.
So, when we said that we... liked them, we actually meant... we were...
And loving every minute of it, let me tell ya.
Everyone loved it because I say, "But I Iike the english very much."
Liked the ladies, though. How's that?
It's agreed, The Man Who Loved Women.
UNTIL IT HELPED YOUR MOTHER DECIDE THAT SHE LIKED WOMEN.
You said this guy likes the ladies, right?
He said that being married to me was what convinced him that he liked men.
Now, I already knew my daughter was into girls; that's not news to me.
